leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 科研知识图谱-实体规范化与证据链生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 抽取→对齐→融合→推理→版本→评测

queries: [WEB] link prediction datasets and metrics github
[WEB] biomedical knowledge graph evaluation tools github

tools.name: GraphRAG-Agent
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated framework for Knowledge Graph construction and RAG with custom evaluation
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive agent-based framework that integrates GraphRAG, LightRAG, and Neo4j for knowledge graph construction and search. It includes DeepSearch for private RAG reasoning and features a custom evaluation framework specifically designed for GraphRAG systems.

tools.name: LLM-KG-Bench
tools.one_line_profile: Automated benchmarking framework for LLMs on Knowledge Graph tasks
tools.detailed_description: A framework and task collection designed for the automated benchmarking of Large Language Models (LLMs) across various Knowledge Graph (KG) related tasks, facilitating standardized evaluation of LLM capabilities in structured knowledge domains.

tools.name: AmpliGraph
tools.one_line_profile: Library for representation learning on Knowledge Graphs
tools.detailed_description: A Python library dedicated to representation learning on Knowledge Graphs (KGs). It provides implementations of various graph embedding models to predict links and discover new knowledge within KGs.

tools.name: tacrev
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation framework for TACRED relation extraction task
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit providing a thorough evaluation of the TACRED Relation Extraction task, including revised datasets and evaluation scripts to address issues in the original benchmark.

tools.name: GraphVite
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance graph embedding system
tools.detailed_description: A general and high-performance graph embedding system designed for high-speed training of node embeddings on large-scale graphs, supporting various CPU and GPU architectures.

tools.name: ChatGPT-IE-Eval
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation framework for ChatGPT on Information Extraction tasks
tools.detailed_description: A framework for evaluating the performance of ChatGPT on various Information Extraction (IE) tasks, including Named Entity Recognition (NER), Relation Extraction (RE), Event Extraction (EE), and Aspect-based Sentiment Analysis (ABSA).

tools.name: Digital Twin Benchmark Generator
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge graph benchmark dataset generator for digital twins
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating knowledge graph benchmark datasets specifically tailored for digital twin use cases, facilitating the evaluation of semantic technologies in industrial digital twin scenarios.

tools.name: Otter-Knowledge
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge-enhanced representation learning for drug discovery
tools.detailed_description: A library that enriches protein sequence and SMILES drug databases with a large Knowledge Graph fused from different sources, improving performance on drug target binding affinity prediction benchmarks.

tools.name: OpenPSG
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark framework for Panoptic Scene Graph Generation
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmarking codebase for Panoptic Scene Graph Generation (PSG), providing tools for training and evaluating models that generate scene graphs with panoptic segmentation information.

tools.name: PAS-OGB
tools.one_line_profile: Pooling Architecture Search for Graph Classification
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Pooling Architecture Search (PAS) for graph classification tasks, specifically designed for Open Graph Benchmark (OGB) datasets.

tools.name: OpenPVSG
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for Panoptic Video Scene Graph Generation
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking framework for Panoptic Video Scene Graph Generation (PVSG), facilitating the development and evaluation of models that understand dynamic scene graphs in videos.

tools.name: MORE
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal Object-Entity Relation Extraction Benchmark
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark evaluation framework and dataset for Multimodal Object-Entity Relation Extraction, designed to assess models on extracting relations between visual objects and textual entities.

tools.name: OpenBioLink
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation framework for biomedical link prediction
tools.detailed_description: A resource and evaluation framework for evaluating link prediction models on heterogeneous biomedical graph data, providing standardized benchmarks for biomedical knowledge graphs.

tools.name: KAG
tools.one_line_profile: Logical form-guided reasoning and retrieval framework
tools.detailed_description: A framework for logical reasoning and factual Q&A on professional domain knowledge bases, combining the OpenSPG engine with LLMs to overcome limitations of traditional vector similarity RAG models.

tools.name: DyKGChat
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for dialogue generation on dynamic knowledge graphs
tools.detailed_description: A model and benchmarking code for dialogue generation grounded on dynamic knowledge graphs, addressing the challenge of incorporating evolving knowledge into conversational agents.

tools.name: CONVEX
tools.one_line_profile: Unsupervised conversational QA over knowledge graphs
tools.detailed_description: An unsupervised method and framework for conversational question answering over knowledge graphs, enabling QA systems to operate without large-scale annotated training data.

tools.name: YouGraph
tools.one_line_profile: Graph learning library for OGB benchmarks
tools.detailed_description: A collection of graph learning codes and models designed for the Open Graph Benchmark (OGB), facilitating the development and testing of GNNs on standard datasets.

tools.name: OpenGDA
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Domain Adaptation Benchmark
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark for Graph Domain Adaptation (GDA) focusing on cross-network learning tasks, providing datasets and evaluation protocols for adapting graph models across different domains.

tools.name: BioKEEN
tools.one_line_profile: Library for learning and evaluating biological KG embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A computational library designed for learning and evaluating embeddings on biological knowledge graphs, facilitating the application of KG embedding models in bioinformatics.

tools.name: Deep_GCN_Benchmarking
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for training deeper Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmark study and codebase for training deeper Graph Neural Networks (GNNs), providing 'bag of tricks' and evaluation protocols to improve GNN performance on various tasks.

tools.name: GraphGPT
tools.one_line_profile: Generative pre-trained graph transformer for graph structure modeling
tools.detailed_description: A generative pre-trained graph model based on the Eulerian Transformer architecture, designed to handle graph generation and representation learning tasks, applicable to molecular and protein graph modeling.

tools.name: Graph Classification Benchmarks
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking framework for Graph Neural Networks using PyTorch Lightning
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking suite for evaluating Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) on standard datasets like Open Graph Benchmarks (OGB) and superpixel image classification tasks, leveraging PyTorch Lightning for reproducible training loops.

tools.name: DGL-KE
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance library for learning large-scale knowledge graph embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A scalable and efficient package for training knowledge graph embedding models, supporting distributed training on large-scale datasets, built on top of the Deep Graph Library (DGL).

tools.name: PheKnowLator
tools.one_line_profile: Ecosystem for constructing heterogeneous biomedical knowledge graphs
tools.detailed_description: A Python library and workflow for constructing large-scale, heterogeneous biomedical knowledge graphs from diverse data sources, supporting alternative semantic models and benchmarking.

tools.name: Interpret LM Knowledge
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for extracting knowledge graphs from language models
tools.detailed_description: A diagnostic benchmark tool for extracting and evaluating knowledge graphs from pre-trained language models to interpret their internal knowledge representation.

tools.name: SEAL_OGB
tools.one_line_profile: SEAL implementation for link prediction on OGB datasets
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the SEAL (Subgraphs, Embeddings, Attributes, and Link prediction) framework specifically optimized for link prediction tasks on Open Graph Benchmark (OGB) datasets.

tools.name: LinkPrediction
tools.one_line_profile: R package for link prediction and performance assessment
tools.detailed_description: An R library implementing various classes of link predictors for network analysis, along with methods to assess and visualize their performance.

tools.name: DRKG
tools.one_line_profile: Drug Repurposing Knowledge Graph and analysis tools
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive biological knowledge graph and a set of associated tools designed for drug repurposing studies, including pre-processing and embedding generation utilities.

tools.name: Distributed KGE Poplar
tools.one_line_profile: Distributed knowledge graph embedding system for Graphcore IPUs
tools.detailed_description: An end-user training and evaluation system for standard knowledge graph embedding models, optimized for distributed execution on Graphcore IPU hardware using the Poplar SDK.

tools.name: OGB-LSC PCQM4Mv2 Solver
tools.one_line_profile: Graphcore implementation for OGB Large Scale Challenge PCQM4Mv2
tools.detailed_description: Implementations and tools for the OGB Large Scale Challenge (OGB-LSC) PCQM4Mv2 dataset, focusing on graph machine learning tasks for quantum chemistry on Graphcore hardware.

tools.name: CogKGE
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit and benchmark for multi-source knowledge graph embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A knowledge graph embedding toolkit and benchmark designed for representing multi-source and heterogeneous knowledge, providing unified interfaces for training and evaluation.

tools.name: KGEval
tools.one_line_profile: Fine-grained evaluation framework for Knowledge Graph Embedding models
tools.detailed_description: A framework designed to evaluate Knowledge Graph Embedding (KGE) models in a fine-grained manner, allowing for detailed performance analysis beyond standard metrics.

tools.name: OpenEA
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking library for embedding-based entity alignment in knowledge graphs
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmarking library for Entity Alignment (EA) in Knowledge Graphs, providing implementations of state-of-the-art embedding-based EA approaches and standard datasets.

tools.name: GTFS-Madrid-Bench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for Knowledge Graph construction engines using transport data
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite designed to evaluate the performance and scalability of Knowledge Graph construction engines (like RML mappers) using GTFS (General Transit Feed Specification) data.

tools.name: PyKEEN
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for learning and evaluating knowledge graph embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python library for training and evaluating Knowledge Graph Embedding (KGE) models, offering a unified pipeline for dataset loading, model training, and evaluation.

tools.name: Open Knowledge Graph Embeddings
tools.one_line_profile: Library for training and benchmarking open knowledge graph embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A library designed for training embeddings on Open Knowledge Graphs (where schema is not fixed) and benchmarking open link prediction tasks.

tools.name: Open Graph Benchmark (OGB)
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark datasets and evaluators for graph machine learning
tools.detailed_description: A collection of realistic, large-scale, and diverse benchmark datasets for machine learning on graphs, including specific tasks for molecular property prediction and biological networks.

tools.name: STaRK
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for LLM retrieval on textual and relational knowledge bases
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark for evaluating Large Language Models (LLMs) on retrieval tasks over semi-structured knowledge bases, including biomedical knowledge graphs.

tools.name: KG-Gen
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for generating knowledge graphs from text
tools.detailed_description: A tool leveraging sequence-to-sequence models to generate knowledge graphs directly from input text, facilitating knowledge extraction from scientific literature.

tools.name: OpenKE
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source package for knowledge graph embedding
tools.detailed_description: A widely used open-source framework for knowledge graph embedding, providing efficient implementations of various translational and semantic matching models.

tools.name: KG20C
tools.one_line_profile: A scholarly knowledge graph benchmark dataset for link prediction and node classification
tools.detailed_description: KG20C is a large-scale scholarly knowledge graph dataset constructed from high-quality papers, designed to serve as a benchmark for evaluating knowledge graph embedding and graph neural network models in the context of scientific literature.

tools.name: LibKGE
tools.one_line_profile: A PyTorch-based library for knowledge graph embedding models
tools.detailed_description: LibKGE is a knowledge graph embedding library designed for reproducible research. It provides implementations of various embedding models, training strategies, and hyperparameter optimization tools to facilitate the study and development of KGE methods.

tools.name: BioKGBench
tools.one_line_profile: A benchmark for evaluating AI agents on biomedical knowledge graphs
tools.detailed_description: BioKGBench is a knowledge graph checking benchmark designed to evaluate the performance of AI agents in the biomedical domain. It focuses on assessing the ability of agents to perform reasoning and fact-checking tasks within biomedical knowledge graphs.

tools.name: GraphEval
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for evaluating LLM factuality using knowledge graphs
tools.detailed_description: GraphEval is a tool designed to evaluate the factuality of Large Language Models (LLMs) by leveraging large-scale knowledge graphs. It provides a pipeline to check the consistency of LLM-generated content against structured knowledge bases.

tools.name: DeepKE
tools.one_line_profile: An open toolkit for knowledge graph extraction and construction
tools.detailed_description: DeepKE is a comprehensive toolkit for knowledge graph extraction and construction. It supports various tasks such as named entity recognition, relation extraction, and attribute extraction, providing a unified framework for building knowledge graphs from unstructured text.
